regulations.title: Hotel Classification & Operational Standards 2025
regulations.summary: Mandates a point-based classification system for 1-6 stars. Specifically requires a 20-hour minimum between check-in and check-out (effective Aug 2025). Boutique hotels (10-100 rooms) must be at least 3-star.

regulations.authority: Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development (MHRSD)
regulations.title: Nitaqat & Saudization Rules 2025
regulations.summary: 100% Saudization for Front Desk/Reception roles by April 2026. Requirement for at least one Saudi receptionist on duty by Oct 2025. Minimum wage of SAR 4,000 for 1:1 Saudization count in Nitaqat.

regulations.title: Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL)
regulations.summary: Governs the processing of guest and employee personal data. Requires data localization and strict consent/access protocols. Fines up to SAR 5M for violations.

regulations.title: Halal Compliance & Food Safety Standards
regulations.summary: Strict Halal certification for all imported meat. Kitchens must follow HACCP/SFDA guidelines for storage and cross-contamination.

verification_checklist: Verify National ID/Iqama via Absher/Muqeem during check-in.
Ensure MoT License is displayed at reception and updated yearly.
Confirm Saudi receptionist presence per shifts.
Audit Halal certificates for all meat suppliers.
